author: Tony Tobin
method: Place the cucumber, yoghurt, mint and ice into a food processor and blend together. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, pour into a bowl and garnish with a mint leaf.
ingredients: ½ cucumber,  150g/5½oz Greek yoghurt ,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint,  small handful crushed ice,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  mint leaf, to garnish
